title: Pawan Kalyan's life story is not included in the 10th class English book by Karnataka state government
subtitle: Karnataka State government has not included Pawan Kalyan's life story as a lesson in the 10th class English book. His picture is included in a 'Movie Making' lesson of a 5th class textbook as an example of 'take' captured during a shoot.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on social media with a claim that the Karnataka state government has added the life story of the President of Janasena party and Tollywood Movie actor, Pawan Kalyan as a lesson in the 10th class English textbook. Let’s verify the claim made in the post.

Claim: Karnataka State government has added the life story of the President of Janasena party and Tollywood Movie actor, Pawan Kalyan as a lesson in the 10th class English textbook. Fact: Karnataka State government has not added Pawan Kalyan’s life story as a lesson in the 10th class English book. The page which has Pawan Kalyan’s photo is taken from a 5th class English book called ‘Together with Expressions English Multiskill Coursebook’ by ‘RachnaSagar’ publications. However, the book doesn’t have any lesson about Pawan Kalyan’s life. Even Pawan Kalyan’s name is not mentioned in the book. In a lesson titled ‘Movie Making’, the book included a photo of Pawan Kalyan holding a movie clap just as a representational image. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When searched on the internet about the information shared in the post, no information about Karnataka State government’s inclusion of Pawan Kalyan’s life story as a lesson in the 10th class English book was found. Also, when searched in the 10th class English book related to Karnataka state syllabus, no details related to Pawan Kalyan were found.

In the posted video, a page with Pawan Kalyan photo can be seen. When searched on Google using the words from that page, it was found that a school from Bhopal uploaded that book on their website. However, currently, the school’s website is not functioning. Through the information available on Google cache of this page, the names of chapters in the book were found. From that information, when searched on Google, it was found that a school in Haryana had uploaded full details about that book on their website.

Based on that information, we came to know that the page with Pawan Kalyan’s photo was taken from a 5th class book called ‘Together with Expressions English Multiskill Coursebook’ by ‘RachnaSagar’ publications. However, the book doesn’t have any lesson about Pawan Kalyan’s life story. Even Pawan Kalyan’s name is not mentioned in the book. In a lesson named- ‘Movie Making’, the book included a photo of Pawan Kalyan holding a ‘movie clap’ with the caption ‘Taking a ‘take’ of a scene’. This picture is just used as a representational image to indicate how a ‘take’ is captured.

To sum it up, Karnataka State government has not included Pawan Kalyan’s life story as a lesson in the 10th class English book. His picture is included in a ‘Movie Making’ lesson of a 5th class textbook as a representational image of ‘take’ captured during a shoot.
